title: Aha4593
author: Aha4593
content: Hello.I'm a new user and I'm kinda familiar to cryptocurrencies. Recently my cousin's wallet got blocked and he got arrested because he owed someone some money and since his wallet was blocked he couldn't pay him. He claimed that he had 600000$ in his wallet and he made that money in a few months! He was making 2000$ per day.He said he was trading cryptocurrencies (probably buying them for people and getting a wage for that) with some specific Asian countries. Unfortunately he didn't give much detail. So now I'm here to ask, is that even possible?If yes, how exactly?

comments.author: Dhrugtest
comments.body: Lol don't let that device you trading static is very intresting if you had profit but before going into it you have to risk the money you can lose on it because market fails sometimes but it depend on who introduced you it to you properly they do got WhatsApp group or Telegram group for a signal to trade on, to me trading it's cool if you see the right plug ðŸ”Œ

comments.author: Aha4593
comments.body: Quote from: Dhrugtest on June 09, 2022, 07:21:23 AMLol don't let that device you trading static is very intresting if you had profit but before going into it you have to risk the money you can lose on it because market fails sometimes but it depend on who introduced you it to you properly they do got WhatsApp group or Telegram group for a signal to trade on, to me trading it's cool if you see the right plug ðŸ”ŒWell i actually didn't mean that. From what i heard he did something illegal. I'm just wondering what exactly he did. He claimed to be something like a broker.
